project.name: GoCarbonTracker
project.description: Premium B2B consulting services (Scope 3 emissions, LCA, double materiality assessments, decarbonization strategies) fund a completely free educational platform, creating a sustainable bridge between professional sustainability and public climate education

goal.description: Transform sustainability consulting through specialized expertise while democratizing climate education through business excellence - where professional consulting success directly enables free access to enterprise-grade sustainability tools and curriculum for all

use_of_funds.description: Advanced Scope 3 tracking, LCA frameworks, double materiality assessments, CSRD compliance, enterprise consulting workflows
Free educational modules, teacher dashboards, mobile learning app, multilingual content, community forums
Infrastructure, team expansion, consulting expertise, client relationship management

milestones.title: Foundation & Scope 3 Specialization
deliverables: Advanced Scope 3 emissions tracking and calculation engines
LCA framework integration and automated reporting
Enterprise-grade data validation and audit trails
Educational platform foundation with free access tier

milestones.title: Advanced Analytics & Double Materiality
deliverables: Double materiality assessment framework and automation
AI-powered supply chain emissions hotspot identification
CSRD-compliant reporting with professional audit support
Real business case studies integrated into educational curriculum

milestones.title: Enterprise Scale & Consulting Workflow
deliverables: White-label solutions for sustainability consulting firms
Advanced LCA automation reducing delivery time by 70%
Teacher dashboard with student progress tracking

milestones.title: Educational Excellence & Community
deliverables: Community forums connecting students with professionals

revenue_model.strategy: High-value consulting engagements (€2K-25K per project) targeting European companies' complex sustainability challenges, with consulting margins funding free educational access for schools, students, and the general public
revenue_model.target_revenue: €25K MRR by month 6 through specialized consulting services
revenue_model.sustainability: Premium consulting revenue funds completely free educational platform access

business_model.value_proposition: Democratizing climate education through business excellence - where professional consulting success directly enables free access to enterprise-grade sustainability tools and curriculum for all

target_markets.primary: European companies requiring specialized sustainability consulting
target_markets.secondary: Schools, students, and public seeking professional climate education

competitive_advantage: Specialized expertise in Scope 3, LCA, and double materiality
Professional tools made freely accessible for education
Real business cases enhance educational content quality
Sustainable funding model through high-value consulting

founder.name: Varun Moka
founder.expertise: B2B consulting, platform development, sustainability strategy

planned_expansion: Educational content specialists and curriculum designers
Sustainability consulting experts for client delivery

transparency.progress_tracking: Monthly progress reports published on platform

transparency.community_involvement: Open roadmap with community voting on educational features
